FuncDef: The snmp-agent trap enable feature-name ospf command enables the trap function for the OSPF module.
CLIs: undo snmp-agent trap enable feature-name <feature-name-val> trap-name { ospftxretransmit | ospfvirtifauthfailure | ospfvirtifconfigerror | ospfvirtifrxbadpacket | ospfvirtifstatechange } *

ParaDef.Info:
feature name.
The value is a string of 1 to 7 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: [~HUAWEI] snmp-agent trap enable feature-name ospf trap-name ospftxretransmit
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the traps of one or more events, you can specify trap-name.
